rawquery.query: SELECT 0 sysversionid,DATE_FORMAT(oh.invoiceDate, '%m-%Y') as month,pd.name,SUM(od.qty) as qty,SUM(od.total) total,count(DISTINCT(p.id)) numberofCustomers FROM `orderdetails` od INNER JOIN orderheader oh on od.invoiceNo=oh.invoiceNo INNER JOIN profile p on oh.profileId=p.id INNER JOIN products pd on od.itemid=pd.itemid Where oh.invoiceDate between '$startdate' and '$enddate' GROUP by DATE_FORMAT(oh.invoiceDate, '%M-%Y'),pd.name
